Developer Terms of Use
des:
Please ensure your Logitech Harmony remote is set up prior to linking with Amazon Alexa. To learn more about Harmony product setup and which Alexa skills to enable, visit: myharmony.com/alexa-skills


Customers with Harmony Express:
-------------------
Use this skill to enable Alexa voice control on your Harmony hub-based product, such as Harmony Elite, Companion or Hub.


Customers without Harmony Express:
-------------------
Please go back and search for “Harmony” (blue icon). You may use the “Harmony” skill to enable Alexa voice control on your Harmony hub-based product.


About this skill
-------------------
Once enabled, use Amazon Alexa with your Harmony remote to start and stop Activities, change channels, control volume and play/pause your content. Use your voice to jump to your favorite TV station, or launch a Roku channel. For example, say, “Alexa, turn on the TV” to power on your TV, AV receiver and cable box and set them all to the right inputs.

Try saying
 "Alexa, turn on TV" 
 "Alexa, go to ESPN"
 "Alexa, go to channel 29"
 "Alexa, turn up the volume"
 "Alexa, mute"
 "Alexa, go to Netflix app"
 "Alexa, turn off TV"
